alert.note: Alert for Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:36PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact the Cherry Creek and Malad region through 730 PM MDT... At 635 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Swanlake to 7 miles east of Cherry Creek Rest Area. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Brief moderate rain, wind gusts to 40 mph, small hail, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malad, Pleasantview, Cherry Creek Rest Area, Samaria and Daniels Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
